message: Let's start with a fair split. I'm willing to give you a little more since the money will depreciate faster for me.

I appreciate your generosity in the first round, Alice.  But I think we can both do better. This offer reflects the fact that the money is worth less to you than it is to me, so we can still both come out ahead.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to get a better share than your last offer. This is closer to a fair split considering the inflation.
